blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description: Checks if the damage was successfully blocked.

dealt.title: Dealt
dealt.description: Checks the amount of incoming damage before damage reduction.

source_entity.title: Source Entity
source_entity.description: Checks the entity that was the source of the damage (for example: The skeleton that shot the arrow).

taken.title: Taken
taken.description: Checks the amount of incoming damage after damage reduction.

type.title: Type
type.description: Checks the type of damage done.
